structure.unit: SERVICE OF PROCESS ON NONRESIDENT MOTORISTS

law.catch_line: Application of process provisions to resident becoming nonresident.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 188.010 to 188.060 shall apply to any operator or owner of any motor vehicle who is a resident of this state at the time any accident or collision or damage occurs and who thereafter becomes a nonresident.
law.history: Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 2, effective June 16, 1960. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 2.
